page.title: 18TRADE
page.content:
The only shop is a general store at Holywood scheme. It also has a post office with old age pensions a savings bank-savings certificates, Premium Bonds ,T.V. licences etc being dispensed. Apart from agriculture and previously mentioned joiners, transport and boat building businesses other trading takes the form of van selling. Milk is delivered 6 times a week by Butlins dairy. Fish, butchermeat and greengrocer vans call weekly as does a lemonade van owned by a local man. Cowhill Estate administration is run from the factors office at Killylung.
The{Mobile Library}is available in the are every 3 weeks.
